alert.note: Alert for Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 17 at 3:42AM MST until February 17 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. * WHERE...The Wet Mountain Valley, the mid Arkansas River Valley east of Salida to west of Canon City, and Huerfano County including Walsenburg. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The slick conditions will impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft; Western, Central Fremont County Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft
